data.title: Addam's Family
data.text: Went to the musical Addam's Family. Well done. Kudos to actors, director, and wonderful staff/volunteers/workers. Enjoyed the play very much and will try to go to a show the next time we are in the area.

data.title: History and local live theater!
data.text: We are season ticket holders for years!  This hosts some of the best local theater productions in the area. The ticket prices are cheap.  We just saw The Addams Family musical which was fabulous!

data.title: Crighton Theater
data.text: This is a fun place.  They have great shows.  My wife and I have gone to several plus some concerts.  Highly recommended.

data.title: Beautiful architecture, historical building
data.text: The Crichton is a former movie theater converted to a traditional playhouse. It is a beautiful old building just off the square in downtown Conroe. Seating is comfortable with good visibility throughout the theatre. The plays at the Crichton are well presented by talented performers. Highly recommended for a special night out or for just a little small town culture.

data.title: Really Enjoyed the Evening
data.text: My boss and I attended a play here and she and I thoroughly enjoyed the old theater's style and grace in addition to a wonderful play. I'd definitely go here again!

data.title: Great Live Performances
data.text: This is a great place; it is very old yet well kept. I've seen three performances in this theater and have enjoyed them all.

data.title: Wonderful old theatre
data.text:
I love that the production groups are keeping this place alive.
I'm always impressed with the quality of the acting and background artistry.

data.title: What a nice step back in time
data.text: Have enjoyed every show I have seen there. Would recommend the Crighton to anyone looking for something easy to get to, affordable and a little out of the ordinary.

data.title: Such a fun place to view a show.
data.text: Truly enjoy the cast and crew who do a great job bringing shows to life.  Parking is easier now and they are soon to have some art and vendor shows nearby as well. Good job Conroe.

data.title: Quaint theatre
data.text: We love the Crighton! It's very charming. All seats are good seats in this quaint theatre! I've seen 3 plays here and enjoyed them all! Tickets are reasonably priced.

data.title: Saw a very good play there
data.text: Saw a very good musical (Anything Goes) there.  Was impressed with the good seating and acoustics.  The girl who played the lead was fantastic and worth the price of admission.  Fun meeting with the cast outside afterwards.  I'm not a theater goer but I did have a very good time.

data.title: Wonderful entertainment venue.
data.text: Crighton Theater is one of Conroe's oldest entertainment venues, located in downtown Conroe. The theater hosts year round events which include theatrical plays, and concerts by some of the best known artists.

data.title: Outstanding Performing Arts Venue
data.text: This gem of a performing arts venue is an excellent place for musicians.   I am a season ticket holder for The Sounds of Texas Music Series and every concert is a blast.  I can tell the musicians like the acoustics because they always comment.  The theater seats less than 500 in the audience so one gets treated to a very personalized performance regardless of where your seat is located.  The Crighton also hosts a variety of plays and special performances.

data.title: An inexpensive great evening
data.text: While this is only community theater, the acting and the stage setup is very good.  The building is one of the oldest structures in Conroe, TX and its history is quite interesting.  The prices of the performances are very reasonable and make for a fun and inexpensive date night.  My wife and I enjoy watching performances here.  I highly recommend it.

data.title: A Favorite Entertainment Place
data.text: Love the size (small) and decor in the Crighton. All the seats are good and acoustics are great. Have seen many acts there and never been disappointed!

data.title: Historic Venue
data.text: The Crighton puts on some great programs throughout the year.  The historic venue has great sight lines and is very intimate

data.title: Beautiful old theater with wonderful community theater
data.text: We recently saw our first community theater production, On Golden Pond.   The acting and  scenery were wonderful.   I look forward to attending more

data.title: Old fashioned theater fun
data.text: The local troupe of actors, director, and others who run this theater take me back to another time.  The productions are well done and lots of fun.  In a world of electronics, 3 & 4 D movies, video games, etc. it is refreshing to visit a small town theater and see it thrive.  Keep up the great work!!!  I highly recommend.

data.title: Les Miserables performance
data.text: Loved this old theater! The kids that put on this performance were wonderful! I will be back to see another performance here. The seats were all good and sound was wonderful!

data.title: Sounds of Texas!
data.text: When I was young this was the only movie house in town. Thankfully it's been saved & has come a long way from the early days with separate entrances & facilities. Quite a shock as a child from city( Houston )visiting his cousins in the country (Conroe) Most of the vestiges have been removed in the remodel Great Sounds of Texas Music Aeries held here !
